value:
Your commander is Anna, yes? She
yell at Gregor. Say, "no sleeping
here!" Strong woman not so bad!

Gregor has been to many lands as
mercenary. Job don't matter, but
Gregor won't beat up weak ones.

You are looking tired. You should
make tea with herbs and rest. Too
tired, maybe is dying in battle!

Why not take Gregor somewhere
fun? Gregor want to see some
beauties! Give energy for the fighting.

Ow! Crick in Gregor's back. Grrr...
When did this happen? In battle
before?

Your friend $Nf
say hello!$k$pNothing better than friends.

What is this? Gregor's biceps
tingling!

Hmm... Gregor have crick in
back tomorrow.

Oh dear. Gregor not make good
impression.

Getting stronger! Thank you.
Ready to work hard now!

Gregor wandering mercenary. This
very fancy place you got here!
Gregor's fee going to be very high.

Talking to Gregor? You must be very
lonely. Come! Gregor give you big,
big bear hug!$k$pNot lonely? But you are always
coming to visit! Gregor thinking
you fall for him, maybe. $k$pWhy staring? So cold! Gregor only
tell truth, my friend! You are hurting
feelings.$k$pIs wonderful you spend so much time
with Gregor. So many Heroes here,
and you picking this one!$k$pYou can count on Gregor in battleâ€”
always. You staying strong in battle
too. Always will be watching out!
No want to get along, eh?
Now to face maker!
You fight poorly!
You done now, yes?
What I live for?
You want Gregor notice you? No little tapping. Speak with big voice! Hah!
You get it wrong. Gregor not old man. Gregor young and so strong! Young!
Is Gregor really so scary? Really? Hmph.
Before, Gregor just mercenary. Now, Gregor "Hero!" Hah!
Lately Gregor work for free too much! Gregor is poor, like beggar.
Gregor need less-dangerous contract. Is crazy, this war!
You are very lucky! Why? Is not obvious? You summon stallion like Gregor! Hah!
Hoh!
Gregor is on job.
What fun!
